title: Jumbled House
description: Unjumble the shapes into a house

tests.name: Position the frame of the house.

checks.name: getRectangleAt(20,50,60,40)
checks.error_html: The frame of the house is not at (20,50,60,40).

tests.name: Position the roof of the house.

checks.name: getTriangleAt(16,50, 50,30, 84,50)
checks.error_html: The roof of the house is not at the correct position.

tests.name: Position the windows of the house.

checks.name: getRectangleAt(30,55,12,13)
checks.error_html: The left window frame isn't positioned correctly

checks.name: getRectangleAt(58,55,12,13)
checks.error_html: The right window frame isn't positioned correctly

checks.name: getRectangleAt(43,72,14,18)
checks.error_html: The door frame isn't positioned correctly

checks.name: getCircleAt(55,81,1)
checks.error_html: The door knob isn't positiioned correctly
